mapper.insert: insert into tb_rule_custom_interim (interim_rule_id, rule_type, money, car_type, use_date) values (#{interimRuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=REAL}, #{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into tb_rule_custom_interim
interim_rule_id,
rule_type,
money,
car_type,
use_date,
#{interimRuleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ruleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{money,jdbcType=REAL},
#{carType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{useDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_rule_custom_interim where rule_type='全天' and TO_DAYS(use_date) = TO_DAYS(#{date})
select count(*) from tb_rule_custom_interim where TO_DAYS(use_date) = TO_DAYS(#{date})
select money from tb_rule_custom_interim where TO_DAYS(use_date) = TO_DAYS(#{date}) and rule_type='高峰前一个小时' and car_type=#{car_type}
select money from tb_rule_custom_interim where TO_DAYS(use_date) = TO_DAYS(#{date}) and rule_type='高峰普通时段' and car_type=#{car_type}
select money from tb_rule_custom_interim where TO_DAYS(use_date) = TO_DAYS(#{date}) and rule_type='非高峰时段' and car_type=#{car_type}
select money from tb_rule_custom_interim where TO_DAYS(use_date) = TO_DAYS(#{date}) and rule_type='全天最高上限' and car_type=#{car_type}
